Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I sometimes feel reluctant to go to the teacher with questions, meanwhile I dont feel this reluctance when going to AI.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from AI is often more objective and fact based, while teacher feedback often has more subjective feedback that often leads me unsure on how my work is actually perceived, and feeling more confident in the quality of work than I should have
